thread.section_title: AffordableTours.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AffordableTours.com | affordabletours.com
thread.title: Patty Baez

author: Patty Baez
title: Patty Baez
text: My husband and I went to Europe Highlights, it was an awsome expirience their service goes beyond what you can imagine, you are never alone, they make sure you are 100% satisfied with their service from the moment they pick you up from the airport to the moment they drop you off, they make you feel welcome and part of their family, all their staff are very professional and friendly, our tour Director Patricia was lovely, funny and very knowlegable, extrimly smart person, our driver Viciento was a complete genteman, polite and serviceful, I would recomend this company 100+% to evryone, Only thing if you wish to spend more time in each city book a different tour becouse this one is a fast peace tour, you do get to see a lot but too little time in each place but if that is what you are looking for then this is the one. Other than that, loved, loved my expirience with this company and i will use them agiain in the near future!
